applicationStatus.details: You have completed your applicaion and will receive a mail when there is an update
You have passed the application stage and have been invited to take an assesment.
You have completed your applicaion and will receive a mail when there is an update
After reviewing your assessment results, we are sorry to inform you that we will not be proceeding with your application. Thank you.
We are pleased to inform you that you have been selected for the AFEX TECH STARS. More details on this will be sent to you by mail. Congratulations.
